    • Uses of BindingProvider in org.openhab.core.autoupdate

      Subinterfaces of BindingProvider in org.openhab.core.autoupdate 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  AutoUpdateBindingProvider
      This interface is implemented by classes that can provide configuration information of the AutoUpdate feature.
